snippet: “The 9th Life of Louis Drax” starts with a disastrous ninth birthday and some unanswered questions....
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews movie The 9th Life of Louis Drax, directed by Alexandre Aja.
lead_paragraph: “The 9th Life of Louis Drax” starts with a disastrous ninth birthday and some unanswered questions.

headline.main: Review: ‘The 9th Life of Louis Drax.’ So, Little Boys Get Nine Lives, Too?
